means: 点火( light的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In the lighted doorway stood the mountainous figure of a woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个身材高大的女人站在灯光明亮的门口。

sentence.Network_en: Her face lighted when she saw who it was.
sentence.Network_cn: 当她弄明白这是谁时,脸上露出喜色.

sentence.Network_en: The room was well lighted by a dozen windows.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个房间有十来扇窗户,采光甚佳.
